text: @GReschenthaler @realDonaldTrump @fema @realDonaldTrump ramps up his politicization of the #coronavirus and shows his lack of care for Americans and understanding of science by claiming testing is “overrated” while visiting a factory that makes PPE. When will his followers learn he doesn’t care about them just votes?
